name: Potatoes from Mars
description:
Potatoes from Mars is a short horror and adventure game, similar to point and click games.  The history follows an astronaut in his daily tasks on his base on mars while doing researches on potatoes. But his daily life will soon take a turn.

How to Play:

W,A,S,D -> Move

Mouse Click -> Interact

Esc -> Pause

Credits:

bruzin123456 - Programming, Eating Potatoes

Wiltslon - Programming, Sound, Being a potato
